name: @freemework/hosting
description: Hosting library of the Freemework Project.

scripts.clean: find src \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.map' \) -exec rm {} \; ; find test \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.map' \) -exec rm {} \;
scripts.build:package: rm -rf lib && tsc --project tsconfig-package.json && cp README.md .dist/ && jq '{ name: .name, version: .version, description: .description, author: .author, contributors: .contributors, license: .license, keywords: .keywords, repository: .repository, bugs: .bugs, engines: .engines, homepage: .homepage, main: "lib/index.js", types: "lib/index.d.ts", dependencies: .dependencies }' package.json > .dist/package.json
scripts.test: tsc && nyc --exclude submodules --exclude test --extension=".ts" --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary mocha --require source-map-support/register --recursive --timeout 10000 "test/**/*.test.js"
